site_name: Land At Junction Of Stumps Hill Lane And

protected_spaces_details.description: Outdoor sports facilities incl school playing fields

description: Residential development comprising 85 dwellings with estate road and car parking (details of siting/ design/ external appearance/ access/ foul water drainage/ car and bicycle parking/ storage of refuse and recyclable materials/ land for possible future widening of Stumps Hill Lane/ pedestrian access towards Southend Road/ proposals for dwellings for wheelchair users and 'lifetime homes'/ provision for offloading parking and turning during construction/ measures to minimise risk of crime/ affordable housing pursuant to Conditions 1 (a-d) 10/11/12/14/15/17/19/20/21 and the Section 106 Agreement of outline permission ref 05/03755 including relaxation of Condition 17 (ii) regarding provision of alternative means of access within estate)
site_number: Land At Junction Of Stumps Hill Lane And
